fields.description:
iOS 9 added additional styles (constants) to [Font.textStyle|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Font-property-textStyle].  These should be added to the Ti SDK to allow complete support of accessibility features of iOS.

Missing constants:

* TEXT_STYLE_TITLE1
* TEXT_STYLE_TITLE2
* TEXT_STYLE_TITLE3
* TEXT_STYLE_CALLOUT
fields.summary: Add support for iOS 9 Text Style additions

* Target Platform             = iphone

comments.body:
To maintain compatibility with pre iOS 9 versions the following constants return as TEXT_STYLE_BODY:

* TEXT_STYLE_TITLE1
* TEXT_STYLE_TITLE2
* TEXT_STYLE_TITLE3
* TEXT_STYLE_CALLOUT

This can be seen visually in the screenshots shown above.

Verified as fixed, Text Styles for TITLE1 / TITLE2 / TITLE3 / CALLOUT for iOS devices >= 9 match the expected behaviour.

Tested On:
iPhone 6 Plus 10.0.1 Device 
iPhone 5S 9.3.5 Device
Mac OSX El Capitan 10.11.6
Ti SDK:  6.0.0.v20160914165725
Appc Studio: 4.8.0.201609101003
Appc NPM: 4.2.8-6	
App CLI: 6.0.0-42	
Xcode 8.0 
Node v4.4.7

*Closing ticket.*
